Description: Limestone ostracon: on the recto seven lines of an administrative text (extracts from of a journal?). On the verso five(?) lines of text, almost completely washed off, probably of legal character.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (136409) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/136409)
